allowCloudKeychainSync.title: Allow iCloud Keychain Sync
allowCloudKeychainSync.description: If false, disables iCloud keychain synchronization.

allowCloudFMM.title: Allow iCloud Find My Mac
allowCloudFMM.description: If false, disables macOS Find My Mac iCloud service.

allowCloudCalendar.title: Allow iCloud Calendar
allowCloudCalendar.description: If false, disables iCloud Calendar services.

allowCloudReminders.title: Allow iCloud Reminders
allowCloudReminders.description: If false, disables iCloud Reminder services.

allowCloudBTMM.title: Allow iCloud Back to My Mac
allowCloudBTMM.description: If false, disables macOS Back to My Mac iCloud service.

allowCloudNotes.title: Allow iCloud Notes
allowCloudNotes.description: If false, disables iCloud Notes services.

allowCloudPhotoLibrary.title: Allow iCloud Photo Library
allowCloudPhotoLibrary.description: If false, disables iCloud Photo Library. Any photos not fully downloaded from iCloud Photo Library to the device are removed from local storage.

allowCloudBookmarks.title: Allow iCloud Bookmarks
allowCloudBookmarks.description: If false, disables iCloud Bookmark sync.

allowCloudMail.title: Allow iCloud Mail
allowCloudMail.description: If false, disables iCloud Mail services.

allowCloudDesktopAndDocuments.title: Allow iCloud Desktop and Documents Sync
allowCloudDesktopAndDocuments.description: If false, disables cloud desktop and document services.

allowCloudAddressBook.title: Allow iCloud Address Book
allowCloudAddressBook.description: If false, disables iCloud Address Book services.

allowCloudDocumentSync.title: Allow iCloud Drive
allowCloudDocumentSync.description: If false, disables document and key-value syncing to iCloud.

allowCloudPrivateRelay.title: Allow iCloud Private Relay
allowCloudPrivateRelay.description: If false, disables iCloud Private Relay.
